title: How do you edit a post?
body: I can only edit the top. I can't scroll down or anything. Help?

replies.body:
You can click on the edit button just below the post you've made if you need to make any changes to your post. Once you hit that, your post will turn into a text box with your current post already filled in. Then you're free to edit until you've fixed or added whatever was needed. Click save at the bottom right of the text box and you're done!

If you're still having issues, hit me up with a screenshot so I can see exactly what's happening on your end.

Hi and thanks for taking the time to respond.

I am aware of how to go into "edit mode". However, when I do so, it only allows me to edit the top of my post. I can't scroll down in it. It's just a small box with the top of the post and nothing else.

Ah I see!

The editing textbox is not one that has the ability to scroll at all. To "scroll down" you can use the down arrow key to get to the bottom of this issue. (Oh I'm so punny xD)

Hope this helps more ^_^!

I am on a mobile device, there isn't a down-arrow key.

Is it impossible on a mobile device?

Our boards aren't quite perfect when it comes to mobile devices just yet. You _can _ scroll when you're on one, though. When you pull up the keyboard to type, you should be able to grab the text cursor in the textbox and drag it up and down to scroll. 

When I tested it myself, it scrolled _very_ fast, so be ready for that.
